_header: Saviour of world Lord and maintainer
Subjects: Christ, hymns to; hymns, to Christ
_description: ‘Salvator mundi domine’ — five stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Saver of world lord and mantenowrThat hast vs kept thys deys tyme
                    and space…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…Wyth herte and Wyll & also owr hole delyteNow and euer by
                    tymes infinite
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 453-5.
